TopicTitle: Hello fellow Kerbanaughts! What is our agenda today?

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody

I just bought the game and thought i would say Hi before i start getting involved in the community, Any tips for a newbie? Any cool plugins or prebuilt ships you would reccomend? Anything at all is appreciated
Welcome to the community! As for cool plugins, I would recommend the Cart mod by Tosh.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

For general use, Kosmos, NovaPunch, NovaSilisko 2.0, and Down Under have some nice parts.

Probodobyne is a must if you want to create space stations/probes, and Bace Construction is nice for Mun bases.

C7 Spaceplanes pack is excellent atmospheric fun.

Hope I didn\'t overwhelm you, haha. Happy launchings!
